original_text: and rescued him from all his troubles. He gave Joseph wisdom and enabled him to gain the goodwill of Pharaoh king of Egypt. So Pharaoh made him ruler over Egypt and all his palace.
korean_text: 그 모든 환난에서 건져내사 애굽 왕 바로 앞에서 은총과 지혜를 주시매 바로가 그를 애굽과 자기 온 집의 통치자로 세웠느니라

sentences.original_text: and rescued him from all his troubles
and enabled him to gain the goodwill of Pharaoh
So Pharaoh made him ruler over Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 바로는 그를 애굽의 통치자로 삼았다
